Specialist Care for Shoulder, Knee and Elbow

Open to patients from all over Sweden.

Patients Healthcare Providers

Urgent referrals are processed within **24 hours** – we can often offer same-day appointments.

Call us directly: +46 8-55 11 04 22 For Patients → For Healthcare Providers →

We are connected to the National Patient Overview (NPÖ) and can, with your consent, access your medical records and X-rays from other regions.

NEW: We now accept patients from all over Sweden without waiting!

Come to Us – No Matter Where You Live

We welcome patients regardless of where in Sweden you live. Choose the pathway that best suits your situation.

Region Stockholm

Referral required

  • ✔ From physician, physiotherapist, chiropractor, etc.
  • ✔ Free card applies
  • ✔ Standard patient fee
Patient fees →

From Another County/Region

Free Healthcare Choice

  • ✔ Referral required (also from Kry/Doktor.se)
  • ✔ No waiting on care guarantee
  • ✔ Free card & standard patient fee
About Free Healthcare Choice →
⚡

Private Patient

Fastest – no referral needed

Fill out our digital form and we'll call you for assessment and booking (usually same week).

Our Expertise

Shoulder

From impingement and rotator cuff injuries to frozen shoulder and osteoarthritis. We diagnose and treat all types of shoulder pain.

Read about shoulder conditions →

Knee

Specialists in meniscus injuries, ACL injuries and knee osteoarthritis. We offer everything from keyhole surgery to advanced rehabilitation.

Read about knee conditions →

Elbow

We treat common conditions such as tennis elbow and golfer's elbow, as well as instability and osteoarthritis of the elbow joint.

Read about elbow conditions →

Patient Information

We believe in well-informed patients. Here you'll find detailed information about different diagnoses, conditions and how surgeries are performed.

Explore condition information →

Rehabilitation Programs

A successful surgery is only half the job. We have developed well-regarded rehabilitation programs that help you return quickly and safely.

See our rehab programs →

Read more reviews on Google

Why Choose Södermalms Ortopedi?

We offer a complete care journey – from initial assessment and diagnosis to highly specialized day surgery and tailored rehabilitation. Our team of experienced orthopedic specialists focuses on modern, minimally invasive techniques to give you the best possible results and the fastest path back to an active life.

Meet Our Doctors

Book a consultation with Dr. Carlos Rivero Siri for shoulder nerve pain.
